title: Do you continue the access line to Dakota despite prohibited leniency?
subtitle: Shortly after the military engineering corps of the energy transport partners refused to grant Dakota a dilution of the pipeline, rumours were circulated alleging that the company would continue construction and would incur a daily fine.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Despite the decision to stop the construction of the access pipeline in Dakota, energy transport partners continued to build it and to accept a fine of $50,000 per day.
